member.name: T:HAL.Helpers.StringConvention
member.summary: Casing and string concatenation options. These can be combined but conflicting cases will override each other, and may produce unpredictable results.

member.name: F:HAL.Helpers.StringConvention.Unset
member.summary: Unset.

member.name: F:HAL.Helpers.StringConvention.Upper
member.summary: Refers to having all of the characters in a string in capitals e.g. UPPER CASE LOOKS LIKE THIS.

member.name: F:HAL.Helpers.StringConvention.Lower
member.summary: Refers to having all of the characters in a string in lower case e.g. lower case looks like this.

member.name: F:HAL.Helpers.StringConvention.Sentence
member.summary: Refers to having the first character of a string in capitals e.g. Sentence case looks like this.

member.name: F:HAL.Helpers.StringConvention.Start
member.summary: Refers to having the first character of each word in a string in capitals e.g. Start Case Looks Like This. Sometimes also referred to as Title Case although Title Case sometimes maintains semantic rules e.g. non-capitalization of 'the' in English.

member.name: F:HAL.Helpers.StringConvention.Concatenation
member.summary: Refers to the concatenation of words by removing all spaces (' '), hyphens ('-') and underscores ('_') e.g. Concatenationlookslikethis.

member.name: F:HAL.Helpers.StringConvention.Pascal
member.summary: Refers to the concatenation of words by Capitalizing the first letter of each e.g. PascalCaseLooksLikeThis. Sometimes also referred to as Upper Camel Case.

member.name: F:HAL.Helpers.StringConvention.Camel
member.summary: Refers to the concatenation of words by Capitalizing the first letter of each bar the first letter which is kept small e.g. camelCaseLooksLikeThis. Sometimes also referred to as lower Camel Case.

member.name: F:HAL.Helpers.StringConvention.Snake
member.summary: Refers to the concatenation of words by replacing spaces (' ') and hyphens ('-') with underscores ('_') e.g. Snake_case_looks_like_this.

member.name: F:HAL.Helpers.StringConvention.Kebab
member.summary: Refers to the concatenation of words by replacing spaces (' ') and underscores ('_') with hyphens ('-') e.g. Kebab-case-looks-like-this.

member.name: F:HAL.Helpers.StringConvention.Unconcatenate
member.summary: Refers to the unconcatenation of words by replacing case changes with spaces e.g. Unconcatenate Case Look Like This.
